/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a winding road in Beijing, China. The road, a two-lane highway, is flanked by lush greenery on both sides, creating a serene and tranquil atmosphere. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking up towards the road and the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the landscape.
